Events

Workshop Macroeconomic Modeling
13 Feb 2014 - Paris
Organizing Institution: IEA

Modeling Workshop
13 Feb 2014 - Mexico
Organizing Institution: INECC
Content: Introduction to model tools & general equilibrium models applied to economic, environmental and energy issues

ETSAP-UCC Workshop
14 Feb 2014 - Cork
Organizing Institution: University College Cork
Content: Methodologies linking energy system models and economics models

Presentation Indonesia BAPPENAS
14 Mar 2014 - Jakarta
Organizing Institution: AFD
Content: The Indonesia Energy and Economy (IEE) Project: Presentation of the ThreeME model

Presentation Negawatt
13 May 2014 - Paris
Organizing Institution: Negawatt
Content: Simulation du scénario Négawatt à l'aide du modèle ThreeME

13 May 2014 - Paris
Organizing Institution: Bercy
